entitymodel.title: Entity of an Open For Business Project Component

field.name: priority
field.description: Sets priority for Inventory Reservation

field.name: productMaintTypeId
field.description: If productMaintSeqId is known can lookup using that and the FixedAsset.productId; for un-scheduled maintenance is filled in directly

field.name: productMaintSeqId
field.description: Optional, though should be filled in to determine upcoming maintenance for all scheduled maintenance

field.name: scheduleWorkEffortId
field.description: Has field for estimated/actual start and finish dates, etc

field.name: intervalUomId
field.description: UOM for intervalQuantity; if used intervalMeterTypeId is generally not used (ie one or the other); if a meter reading is done as well that is not tied to the interval it should be tracked in a FixedAssetMaintMeter record

field.name: intervalMeterTypeId
field.description: Meter Type for intervalQuantity; if used intervalUomId is generally not used (ie one or the other)

field.name: vendorPartyId
field.description: For use with multi-vendor stores, order will be split so that each ship group is associated with only one vendor (only if applicable)

field.name: errorGlJournalId
field.description: Journal to which all the failed automatic transaction are assigned. If the error journal is set, if the GL posting fails for some reason the triggering operation (finalizing an invoice or payment or whatever) would NOT roll back, instead the partial GL post would be placed into the error journal.

field.name: workEffortParentId
field.description: The primary parent (or the like); it should be one of the parent WorkEfforts already setup in WorkEffortAssoc

field.name: timeTransparency
field.description: Deprecated - use the availabilityStatusId field in the assignment entities instead

field.name: fixedAssetId
field.description: Deprecated - use the WorkEffortFixedAssetAssign entity instead

field.name: recurrenceInfoId
field.description: Deprecated - use the tempExprId field instead

field.name: reservPersons
field.description: the number of persons renting the attached asset

field.name: reserv2ndPPPerc
field.description: reservationSecondPersonPricePercentage: percentage of the end price for the 2nd person renting this asset connected to the workEffort

field.name: reservNthPPPerc
field.description: reservationNthPersonPricePercentage: percentage of the end price for the Nth (2+) person renting this asset connected to the workEffort

field.name: custRequestDate
field.description: When the customer (or whoever) submitted the request, maybe out of OFBiz : comming by mail, email, etc.

field.name: responseRequiredDate
field.description: responseRequiredDate is the time the customer needs a response.

field.name: fulfillContactMechId
field.description: Field to support a location of a cust request--ie, product literature sent to an address, service call at a localtion, etc.

field.name: openDateTime
field.description: Used when the customer service person, or anyone assigned to handle the incoming request, opens it for action. You cantake the customer requestdate and openDateTime to see the efficiency of the customer service people.

field.name: closedDateTime
field.description: Used when the customer service person, or anyone assigned to handle the incoming request, closes it as resolution. In some customer response systems, the openDateTime and closedDateTime can happen more than once as the customer is not satified with the resolution.

field.name: createdDate
field.description: When it is actually stored in the system.

field.name: lastModifiedDate
field.description: Last modified date can be till the closedDateTime which is when the customer service people, or anyone assigned to handle the incoming request, says it is resolved. This gives when the last action was done to see if the steps to resolve the request are happening in a timely manner.

field.name: partyId
field.description: party or party group(via partyRelationShip entity) responsible for responding to the communication request of this particular type

field.name: communicationEventId
field.description: now replaced by entity: SubscriptionCommEvent

field.name: maxLifeTime
field.description: The length in time of the (extended) subscription

field.name: automaticExtend
field.description: If this subscription is automatically extended with the same period as the initial period.

field.name: canclAutmExtTime
field.description: The time period (before the end of the thruDate) after which the automatic extension of the subscription will be executed.

field.name: canclAutmExtTimeUomId
field.description: Unit Of Measure used for the automatic extension of the subscription.

relation.description: No foreign key because we want to optionally be able to have a partyId without the other fields.
Note that foreign key not needed because there is an fk for OrderItem.

field.name: contentId
field.description: Optional (use if applicable) ID of a Content record that this would represent a subscription to.

field.name: webSiteId
field.description: Optional (use if applicable) ID of a WebSite record that this would represent a subscription to.

field.name: cancelBackOrderDate
field.description: Used to cancel all orders from suppliers when its in past

field.name: overrideGlAccountId
field.description: Used to specify the override or actual glAccountId used for the adjustment, avoids problems if configuration changes after initial posting, etc.

field.name: statusId
field.description: Point to StatusItem value with statusTypeId="PRTYASGN_STATUS"

field.name: expectationEnumId
field.description: Point to Enumeration value with enumTypeId="WORK_EFF_EXPECT"

field.name: delegateReasonEnumId
field.description: Point to Enumeration value with enumTypeId="WORK_EFF_DEL_REAS"

field.name: availabilityStatusId
field.description: Points to StatusItem value with statusTypeId="WEPA_AVAILABILITY"

field.name: priority
field.description: Sets priority for Inventory Reservation

field.name: pickSheetPrintedDate
field.description: This will be set to a date when pick sheet of the order is printed

field.name: organizationPartyId
field.description: The internal organization Party that owns (or rather, is liable for) the account.

field.name: ownerPartyId
field.description: The customer or third party that owns the account.

field.name: fromDate
field.description: Describes when account will be valid. If null, valid immediately.

field.name: thruDate
field.description: Expiration date of the account. If null, will never expire.

field.name: actualBalance
field.description: Calculated as the sum of FinAccountTrans.amount

field.name: availableBalance
field.description: Calculated as actualBalance minus sum of outstanding FinAccountAuth.amount
